hero.name: YOAN GILLIAND
hero.drivenBy: Driven by innovation and crafting seamless digital experiences, based in Fribourg, Switzerland.

matchRace.name: MATCH RACE
matchRace.description: Match Race is a desktop application designed to streamline photo competition organization for Photo Club Fribourg, featuring automated pairing and voting, real-time audience engagement, and a user-friendly interface.

eParking.name: EPARKING
eParking.description: eParking is a web platform designed to modernize the management of parking permit requests for HES-SO//FR, featuring interactive forms, secure authentication, and an admin interface for efficient request handling and data management.

about.title: I MAKE CODE EFFORTLESS, WEBSITES SEAMLESS AND EXPERIENCES IMPACTFUL.
about.description1: I specialize in full-stack development, building web applications and user-centric solutions for modern businesses. I’m passionate about leveraging the power of technology to solve problems and create seamless digital experiences.
about.description2: Currently, I’m a software engineering student at the Haute école d'ingénierie et d'architecture de Fribourg (HEIA-FR), gaining valuable experience in both front-end and back-end development. I'm constantly exploring new technologies, from Node.js and Vue.js to MySQL, ensuring that I stay at the forefront of industry best practices.
about.description3: When I’m not coding, I love collaborating with peers in tech communities, discovering innovative solutions, and keeping up with the latest in UI/UX design. In my free time, I’m often tinkering with personal projects, enjoying time with friends, or diving into new music genres.
about.description4: I’m always looking for exciting opportunities to collaborate and create meaningful applications. Feel free to reach out!
about.songRecommendation: A few songs I can recommend if you're looking for some fresh and hard tunes :)

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: I write articles to reinforce my knowledge and help out others who might be building something similar.
